statements: DELETE FROM power_grid_performance WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM power_grid_performance WHERE power_consumed > 10000 AND latency < 0.5;
DELETE FROM power_grid_performance WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM power_grid_performance WHERE location='New York');
DELETE FROM power_grid_performance WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
DELETE FROM power_grid_performance WHERE location = 'City A';
DELETE FROM power_grid_performance WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM power_grid_performance WHERE power_consumption > 1000 AND voltage < 220;
DELETE FROM power_grid_readings WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM power_grid_devices WHERE device_type = 'solar');
DELETE FROM power_grid_devices WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM power_grid_locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY');
DELETE FROM power_grid_locations WHERE location_id NOT IN (SELECT location_id FROM power_grid_devices);
DELETE FROM Transformers WHERE transformer_id IN (SELECT transformer_id FROM Transformers WHERE location = 'City A');
DELETE FROM transmission_lines WHERE length > 100 AND status = TRUE
